openlrae-maven-plugin uses third-party components each one of them having its 
own OSS license. License compatibility has been taken into account to allow 
openlrae-maven-plugin be released under its current OSS licence. They are:

- mjson 1.4.1 - Apache-2.0 - http://bolerio.github.io/mjson
- junit-jupiter-engine 5.7.0 - EPL-2.0 - https://junit.org/junit5

Thanks folks!
